level.heading: Public Information Program.
level.text: The Mayor shall ensure that an extensive program of public information detailing the effects of this subchapter is undertaken within 30 calendar days of February 24, 1987.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-166
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-166, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 46-201.

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of authority pursuant to Law 6-166, see Mayor's Order 87-273, December 10, 1987.
